title: Welcome to My Blog
description:
Welcome to our new blog, My Blog. We hope you enjoy 
reading what we have to say!
contents:
Experimenting and testing
This welcome post is just for testing github pages with RStudio and experimenting with R markdown syntax. I will change this again in the future.
